skill_details: Isn’t connecting the dots exciting? It is for me! I love gathering insights across teams and spotting the patterns. I have an insatiable need to understand why we do something.
I conduct comprehensive research, analyze multiple perspectives, and challenge assumptions to uncover nuanced insights—leveraging the right technologies for the most effective solutions.
My work reflects who I am—original, unique, and fueled by a deep curiosity about how ideas take shape. This is why I resonate with startup culture and its enterprising spirit.
Collaboration fuels innovation! I enjoy fostering team rapport by bringing people together across different projects and teams.

Language has always been my strong suit and a core part of my personality. With a knack for wits and elocution, I’ve won numerous competitions—but beyond that, writing is the purest expression of my soul.
